item.title: Overflowing bin, yet again!, 22nd June
item.description:
Public bin overflowing. This is happening so frequently I wonder whether Greenwich Council are reducing their street sweeping. This is really unhygienic unsightly and encourages vermin. Please review your bin emptying schedule.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 56, Kidbrooke Grove, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unbagged food waste left on street, 22nd June

item.title: Bin overflowing and fly tipping next to bin, 22nd June
item.description:
This bin does not have a top, which contributes to trash on the street. It also attracts trash bags next to it. Please add a top or remove it as not to attract more trash.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): De Beauvoir Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Short stumpy green foliage are growing on the pavement and on the triangular piece of highway verge., 22nd June
item.description:
Stumpy green foliage has taken root on the tarmacked pavement and triangular piece of grassed highway verge. Please can these weeds be removed. These weeds are putting more stress on a tree that is already struggling to survive from a lack of water.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mereworth Drive, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree bank on painters lane was planted as a road noise barrier for the residents, 22nd June
item.description:
Ane was planted as a road noise barrier for the residents on park road and Jervis ave en3 however the bank has many gaps where tis needs sorting ie a new noise barrier fence or a tree screen as the noise level is so great we cannot have any windows open at all
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Jervis Avenue, London
